channel.title: This is really beggining to piss me off :\
channel.description:
New laptop, windows 7.. have done all the usual steps downloaded JDK & JRE..
Client keeps closing everytime I click somewhere.. Get this error in the command box:
[code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 1 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=6408, t id=7568 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Grant\Desktop\Project Insanity\Client\hs_err_pid6408.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Can anyone help this is really pissing me off lol <3

item.title: This is really beggining to piss me off :\
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

REALLY! i found it in 20 seconds. typed “64-bit run.bat” http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425280.0.html

I am not trying to be mean but common its right there just use the search bar.

happy posting

Brandon B

Read full topic

@Snaz wrote:

Yep, I have searched Google, Mopar Forums and havn’t really found anything usefull, And I just searched what you told me to and the only thread it showed is this thread lol, could really do with some help because trying to edit my server and looking on client at different area’s to edit… Help appriciated please ;D
